name: mobservable
description: Observable data. Reactive functions. Simple code.

scripts.test-browser: npm run buildtest && ( browserify test/*.js | tape-run )
scripts.coverage: npm run buildtest && istanbul cover tape test/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info|coveralls
scripts.perf: npm run build && time node --expose-gc test/perf/index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build-dist
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-dist: tsc && webpack && uglifyjs --source-map dist/mobservable.min.js.map -o dist/mobservable.min.js dist/mobservable.js
scripts.buildtest: tsc --sourceMap && npm run build-typescript-tests && npm run build-babel-tests

author: Michel Weststrate
